languages.text: "Быть может, я поспешила с выводами о тебе. И вся твоя суть — лишь пустота в цветной оболочке?" {n}Сдержанный выдох срывается с губ эльдарки.{/n} "Предупреждаю, элантах. Еще один намек — и наше понимание ускользнет от тебя".

"Perhaps I was too hasty in my judgement of you. Perhaps your essence is only emptiness inside a colourful shell." {n}A stifled sigh escapes Yrliet's lips.{/n} "I warn you, elantach, one more insinuation and any chance of understanding between us will be forever lost to you."
languages.original_text: "Быть может, я поспешила с выводами о тебе. И вся твоя суть — лишь пустота в цветной оболочке?" {n}Сдержанный выдох срывается с губ эльдарки.{/n} "Предупреждаю, элантах. Еще один намек — и наше понимание ускользнет от тебя".

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps I was too hasty in my judgement of you. Perhaps your essence is only emptiness inside a colourful shell." {n}A stifled sigh escapes Yrliet's lips.{/n} "I warn you, elantach, one more insinuation and any chance of understanding between us will be forever lost to you."

"Perhaps I was too hasty in my judgement of you. Perhaps your essence is only emptiness inside a colourful shell." {n}A stifled sigh escapes Yrliet's lips.{/n} "I warn you, elantach, one more insinuation and any chance of understanding between us will be forever lost to you."

"Perhaps I was too hasty in my judgement of you. Perhaps your essence is only emptiness inside a colourful shell." {n}A stifled sigh escapes Yrliet's lips.{/n} "I warn you, elantach, one more insinuation and any chance of understanding between us will be forever lost to you."

"Perhaps I was too hasty in my judgement of you. Perhaps your essence is only emptiness inside a colourful shell." {n}A stifled sigh escapes Yrliet's lips.{/n} "I warn you, elantach, one more insinuation and any chance of understanding between us will be forever lost to you."

languages.text: «Tal vez me haya precipitado al juzgarte. Quizá tu esencia no sea más que un vacío en el interior de un cascarón de vivos colores». {n}Un quedo suspiro brota de los labios de Yrliet.{/n} «Te lo advertí, elantach; una insinuación más y perderías la oportunidad de llegar a un entendimiento conmigo».
languages.original_text: "Perhaps I was too hasty in my judgement of you. Perhaps your essence is only emptiness inside a colourful shell." {n}A stifled sigh escapes Yrliet's lips.{/n} "I warn you, elantach, one more insinuation and any chance of understanding between us will be forever lost to you."

traits.locale_text: «Tal vez me haya precipitado al juzgarte. Quizá tu esencia no sea más que un vacío en el interior de un cascarón de vivos colores». {n}Un quedo suspiro brota de los labios de Yrliet.{/n} «Te lo advertí, elantach; una insinuación más y perderías la oportunidad de llegar a un entendimiento conmigo».

languages.text: 「我の早とちりだったかもしれないな。もしかしたら、お前あなたの本質は色とりどりの殻に包まれた空虚さにすぎないのかもしれない」{n}ユリエットの口からため息が漏れる。{/n}「エランタ、これは警告だ。これ以上嫌味を言えば、我らがお互いを理解できる機会は永遠に失われると思ってほしい」
languages.original_text: "Perhaps I was too hasty in my judgement of you. Perhaps your essence is only emptiness inside a colourful shell." {n}A stifled sigh escapes Yrliet's lips.{/n} "I warn you, elantach, one more insinuation and any chance of understanding between us will be forever lost to you."

traits.locale_text: 「我の早とちりだったかもしれないな。もしかしたら、お前あなたの本質は色とりどりの殻に包まれた空虚さにすぎないのかもしれない」{n}ユリエットの口からため息が漏れる。{/n}「エランタ、これは警告だ。これ以上嫌味を言えば、我らがお互いを理解できる機会は永遠に失われると思ってほしい」

languages.text: “或许我的结论下得太早了，或许你只是个美丽的贝壳，里面空无一物。”{n}伊莉耶特的唇间逸出一声几不可闻的叹息。{/n}“我警告你，外界人，再这样恶语伤人，我们之间相互理解的机会便会永远溜走。”
languages.original_text: "Perhaps I was too hasty in my judgement of you. Perhaps your essence is only emptiness inside a colourful shell." {n}A stifled sigh escapes Yrliet's lips.{/n} "I warn you, elantach, one more insinuation and any chance of understanding between us will be forever lost to you."

traits.locale_text: “或许我的结论下得太早了，或许你只是个美丽的贝壳，里面空无一物。”{n}伊莉耶特的唇间逸出一声几不可闻的叹息。{/n}“我警告你，外界人，再这样恶语伤人，我们之间相互理解的机会便会永远溜走。”

languages.text: « Il semblerait que je vous aie {mf|jugé|jugée} trop hâtivement. Votre essence n'est peut-être que du vide dans une enveloppe colorée, en fin de compte, {n}dit-elle en poussant un soupir.{/n} Je vous avertis, elantach. Une insinuation de plus et toute chance de compréhension entre nous sera à jamais perdue. »
languages.original_text: "Perhaps I was too hasty in my judgement of you. Perhaps your essence is only emptiness inside a colourful shell." {n}A stifled sigh escapes Yrliet's lips.{/n} "I warn you, elantach, one more insinuation and any chance of understanding between us will be forever lost to you."

traits.locale_text: « Il semblerait que je vous aie {mf|jugé|jugée} trop hâtivement. Votre essence n'est peut-être que du vide dans une enveloppe colorée, en fin de compte, {n}dit-elle en poussant un soupir.{/n} Je vous avertis, elantach. Une insinuation de plus et toute chance de compréhension entre nous sera à jamais perdue. »

languages.text: "Vielleicht war mein Urteil über Euch voreilig. Vielleicht ist Eure Essenz nur Leere in einer bunten Hülle." {n}Ein unterdrücktes Seufzen entweicht Yrliets Lippen.{/n} "Ich warne Euch, Elantach, noch eine Andeutung und jede Aussicht auf ein Verständnis zwischen uns ist für immer verloren."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps I was too hasty in my judgement of you. Perhaps your essence is only emptiness inside a colourful shell." {n}A stifled sigh escapes Yrliet's lips.{/n} "I warn you, elantach, one more insinuation and any chance of understanding between us will be forever lost to you."

traits.locale_text: "Vielleicht war mein Urteil über Euch voreilig. Vielleicht ist Eure Essenz nur Leere in einer bunten Hülle." {n}Ein unterdrücktes Seufzen entweicht Yrliets Lippen.{/n} "Ich warne Euch, Elantach, noch eine Andeutung und jede Aussicht auf ein Verständnis zwischen uns ist für immer verloren."

languages.text: "Belki de seni yargılarken aceleci davranmışımdır. Belki de özün, renkli bir kabuğun içindeki boşluk kadardır." {n}Yrliet'in dudaklarından bir iç çekiş dökülüyor.{/n} "Seni uyarıyorum elantach, tek bir şey daha ima edersen birbirimizi anlama şansımız, ebediyen ortadan kalkacak."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps I was too hasty in my judgement of you. Perhaps your essence is only emptiness inside a colourful shell." {n}A stifled sigh escapes Yrliet's lips.{/n} "I warn you, elantach, one more insinuation and any chance of understanding between us will be forever lost to you."

traits.locale_text: "Belki de seni yargılarken aceleci davranmışımdır. Belki de özün, renkli bir kabuğun içindeki boşluk kadardır." {n}Yrliet'in dudaklarından bir iç çekiş dökülüyor.{/n} "Seni uyarıyorum elantach, tek bir şey daha ima edersen birbirimizi anlama şansı sonsuza dek yok olacak."
